name: Reversible Squares Scarf
description: This scarf features an interpretation of the popular afghan squares with the block pattern appearing on both sides. A 5-row garter stitch band anchors the ends of the scarf, and a 5-stitch seed stitch border prevents curling and rolling, ensuring a smooth drape.
full_text: This scarf features an interpretation of the popular afghan squares with the block pattern appearing on both sides. A 5-row garter stitch band anchors the ends of the scarf, and a 5-stitch seed stitch border prevents curling and rolling, ensuring a smooth drape.
